channel.title: [508] OdinScape Source (MySQL)
channel.description:
[B]Latest Revision: 15[/B]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
P.S. To set this up, compile the source with netbeans, and include the mysql-connector jar. Sorry that there's no guide for this, there is at RaGEZONE, but it's not my thread, so I can't really re-make the thread here. I put the trackbacks to the original thread and guide :coolface:.
[B]HEY GUYS, I'm hiring developers to continue this project of OdinScape! Considering I stopped developing for it for a while. Please apply by PM'ing me! I hope to be seeing a lot of applicants! ;)[/B]
Hey there guys, I decided to release this source to you guys so that YOU guys can help make this source better, since the fact that this source development is dead, and only a once in a while thing for me now. So take this and make me proud. Show me you can get it far.
This is based off of EvilScape V.02, which was based off of a clean Pali 508, which was deleted the day after it came out due to the owner not wanting leeches taking his good source, THEN re-released and is still out there til' this day. I'm about to show that that there are some non-leechers out there.
[B]SVN - [url=http://my-svn.assembla.com/svn/odinscape]odinscape - Revision 15: /[/url][/B]
[B]TRAC - [url=http://my-trac.assembla.com/odinscape]OdinScape - Trac[/url][/B]
[COLOR=Blue][B]Features:[/B][/COLOR] [code]- Admins never get damaged. - MySQL Support. - Cached drops. - Everything from EvilScape V.02 Source. - If you were to code Player Commands, they wouldn't use "::", they will use "!". - All player commands were removed, we HATE player commands. - Full-Screen! (BUGGY). AND A LOT OF MORE FEATURES, I'M JUST TOO LAZY TO TYPE THEM ALL HERE :P.[/code][COLOR=DarkOrange][B]Revisions Information: [/B][/COLOR][code]Rev 1: - Fixed Agressive Monsters so they attack you if your level is lower. - Fixed Jad so he summons 4 of those healers and they heal him. - Fixed Kalphite Queen to spawn the second form when he dies.
Rev 2: - Added MySQL Integration. - Loading drops from MySQL. - Fixed Glod so he says "Glod Smash!"
Rev 3: - Fixing Access modifiers (Not compilable).
Rev 4: - Fixed Kalphite lair.
Rev 5: - MySQL support 100%. - Choice of where to load files.
Rev 6: - Fixed up and Cleaned up Vengeance. - Cleaned up some of the Bounty Hunter code.
Rev 7: - Random updates, clean up, and fixes in the build folder. - Full-Screen was finally comitted. (You need a full-screen client to run this revision, look in the links above, because the client I used should be there, AND TAKE NOTE, IT'S VERY BUGGY! HARDLY ANYTHING WORKS WITH FULLSCREEN! I SUGGEST YOU REMOVE THE BUGS OR JUST USE REVISION 9!) - Frames.java clean-up and fixed grammar. - Login.java clean-up and fixed grammar. - NPC grammar and talking clean-up. - Player.java clean-up. - When you start up the server, it shows the startup of the server in a cooler way. READ MY NOTE I SAID ABOUT FULL-SCREEN!
Rev 8: - More code cleanup. - Some finalizations. - The sacred SQLs, and CFGs, and other files that are required to run the server.
Rev 9: - EVEN more cleanup. - More fixes. - Regular screen is put back, full-screen is still in there, but you have to manually copy and paste the full-screen script that are in the text files into the java files. - Grammar fixes.
Rev 10: - More cleanup, grammar fixes, and re-wrote some messages.
Rev 11: - Deleted useless files that: 1. Take up space. 2. Cause trouble.[/code]
[B]SVN - [url=http://my-svn.assembla.com/svn/odinscape]odinscape - Revision 15: /[/url][/B]
[B]TRAC - [url=http://my-trac.assembla.com/odinscape]OdinScape - Trac[/url][/B]
Memories of OdinMS MapleStory Source... It's time to revolutionize RuneScape development!
Credits (these people are found at ragezone, so you guys might not know them): - Me, wackyracer/wackyracer3. - Moogra. - xJvIaplex.

item.title: [508] OdinScape Source (MySQL)
item.dc:creator: @wackyracer3 wackyracer3
item.description:
@wackyracer3 wrote:

Latest Revision: 15

P.S. To set this up, compile the source with netbeans, and include the mysql-connector jar. Sorry that there’s no guide for this, there is at RaGEZONE, but it’s not my thread, so I can’t really re-make the thread here. I put the trackbacks to the original thread and guide :coolface:.

HEY GUYS, I’m hiring developers to continue this project of OdinScape! Considering I stopped developing for it for a while. Please apply by PM’ing me! I hope to be seeing a lot of applicants!

Hey there guys, I decided to release this source to you guys so that YOU guys can help make this source better, since the fact that this source development is dead, and only a once in a while thing for me now. So take this and make me proud. Show me you can get it far.

This is based off of EvilScape V.02, which was based off of a clean Pali 508, which was deleted the day after it came out due to the owner not wanting leeches taking his good source, THEN re-released and is still out there til’ this day. I’m about to show that that there are some non-leechers out there.

SVN - odinscape - Revision 15: /

TRAC - OdinScape - Trac

[COLOR=Blue]Features:[/COLOR]

[code]- Admins never get damaged.

  • MySQL Support.
  • Cached drops.
  • Everything from EvilScape V.02 Source.
  • If you were to code Player Commands, they wouldn’t use “::”, they will use “!”.
  • All player commands were removed, we HATE player commands.
  • Full-Screen! (BUGGY).
    AND A LOT OF MORE FEATURES, I’M JUST TOO LAZY TO TYPE THEM ALL HERE :P.[/code][COLOR=DarkOrange]Revisions Information:
    [/COLOR][code]Rev 1:
  • Fixed Agressive Monsters so they attack you if your level is lower.
  • Fixed Jad so he summons 4 of those healers and they heal him.
  • Fixed Kalphite Queen to spawn the second form when he dies.

Rev 2:

  • Added MySQL Integration.
  • Loading drops from MySQL.
  • Fixed Glod so he says “Glod Smash!”

Rev 3:

  • Fixing Access modifiers (Not compilable).

Rev 4:

  • Fixed Kalphite lair.

Rev 5:

  • MySQL support 100%.
  • Choice of where to load files.

Rev 6:

  • Fixed up and Cleaned up Vengeance.
  • Cleaned up some of the Bounty Hunter code.

Rev 7:

  • Random updates, clean up, and fixes in the build folder.
  • Full-Screen was finally comitted. (You need a full-screen client to run this revision, look in the links above, because the client I used should be there, AND TAKE NOTE, IT’S VERY BUGGY! HARDLY ANYTHING WORKS WITH FULLSCREEN! I SUGGEST YOU REMOVE THE BUGS OR JUST USE REVISION 9!)
  • Frames.java clean-up and fixed grammar.
  • Login.java clean-up and fixed grammar.
  • NPC grammar and talking clean-up.
  • Player.java clean-up.
  • When you start up the server, it shows the startup of the server in a cooler way.
    READ MY NOTE I SAID ABOUT FULL-SCREEN!

Rev 8:

  • More code cleanup.
  • Some finalizations.
  • The sacred SQLs, and CFGs, and other files that are required to run the server.

Rev 9:

  • EVEN more cleanup.
  • More fixes.
  • Regular screen is put back, full-screen is still in there, but you have to manually copy and paste the full-screen script that are in the text files into the java files.
  • Grammar fixes.

Rev 10:

  • More cleanup, grammar fixes, and re-wrote some messages.

Rev 11:

  • Deleted useless files that:
  1. Take up space.
  2. Cause trouble.[/code]

SVN - odinscape - Revision 15: /

TRAC - OdinScape - Trac

Memories of OdinMS MapleStory Source… It’s time to revolutionize RuneScape development!

Credits (these people are found at ragezone, so you guys might not know them):

  • Me, wackyracer/wackyracer3.
  • Moogra.
  • xJvIaplex.

Read full topic
